com.kth.sda.team.controller

Class InspectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kth.sda.team.controller.InspectionController

  • public class InspectionController
extends java.lang.Object
    The inspection controller that will be passed to the inspection view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • InspectionController

        public InspectionController(InspectionCheckListDTO inspectionChecklistDto,
                            InspectionRegistry inspectionRegistry,
                            QueNumberDisplay displayNumber,
                            Printer printer,
                            ExternalPaymentAuthorizationSystem externalauthSystemOfPayment,
                            GarageDoor garageDoor)
        The Inspection controller's constructor.
        Parameters:
        inspectionChecklistDto - The operation of the inspection that the inspector will perform on the car.
        inspectionRegistry - The database of the inspections that are available for the inspections.
        displayNumber - The display that placed out side the garage.
        printer - The printer device.
        externalauthSystemOfPayment - The External Payment Authorization System to check the credit card if its real or not.
        garageDoor - The garage door.

        public InspectionDTO searchMatchingLicenseNo(InspectionDTO inspectionDTO)
        Search for car's license number in database.
        Parameters:
        inspectionDTO - The license number to be searched.
        Returns:
        null If we didn't find the car's license in the database. found If the found the car's license number.

      • payInspection

        Parameters:
        inspectionDTO - The inspection car object that will get its cost.
        creditCardDTO - The costumer credit card to be checked.

        Parameters:

      • checkStatusOfPayment

        public boolean checkStatusOfPayment(CreditCardDTO creditCardDTO)
        Check the credit card if it is valid or not.
        Parameters:
        creditCardDTO - This object will contain the costumer credit card information.
        Returns:
        true If the credit card is valid. false If the credit card is not valid.
